pr_title: Add firstNonNull function to pipeline processor

timeline.message: Add firstNonNull function to pipeline processor

timeline.bodyText: Functions names usually are snake case, this should be first_non_null.
timeline.author: kroepke

timeline.bodyText:
I think this function should not stringify its return value and should simply return Object.
That way we can use it for IP addresses, lookup table results etc.
timeline.author: kroepke

timeline.bodyText:
I believe <List, List> is the right signature here: we only accept lists anyway, so we should communicate that to the system, so it can generate meaningful error messages.
Right now passing anything that's not a List silently returns "", which can be confusing.
timeline.author: kroepke

replies.bodyText:
E.g. if the function accepts ParameterDescriptor<List, List> as its value, then the error message becomes:
org.graylog.plugins.pipelineprocessor.parser.ParseException: Errors:
 Expected type List for argument value but found String in call to function firstNonNull in line 4 pos 21
replies.author: kroepke

timeline.author: kroepke

timeline.bodyText: I think the default should be null.
timeline.author: kroepke

timeline.bodyText: default would become null and no .toString()
timeline.author: kroepke

timeline.message: Return object and force list as only allowed parameter type
